verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> which came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> from the LORD בִּשְׁלֹ֨חַ <WH7971> sent אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> when הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> when king צִדְקִיָּ֗הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah אֶת־ <WH853> פַּשְׁחוּר֙ <WH6583> unto him Pashur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַלְכִּיָּ֔ה <WH4441> of Melchiah וְאֶת־ <WH853> צְפַנְיָ֧ה <WH6846> and Zephaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son מַעֲשֵׂיָ֛ה <WH4641> of Maaseiah הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> the priest לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דְּרָשׁ־ <WH1875> Enquire נָ֤א <WH4994> Please בַעֲדֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH1157> for us אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> I pray thee of the LORD כִּ֛י <WH3588> for נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> for Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon נִלְחָ֣ם <WH3898> maketh war עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> against אוּלַי֩ <WH194> perhaps יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> will deal יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> against us if so be that the LORD אוֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <WH854> according כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all נִפְלְאֹתָ֔יו <WH6381> with us according to all his wondrous works וְיַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> that he may go up מֵעָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> against ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> Then said יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> as כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> follows תֹאמְרֻ֖ן <WH559> unto them Thus shall ye say אֶל־ <WH413> to צִדְקִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH6667> to Zedekiah

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> I am about מֵסֵב֮ <WH5437> Behold I will turn back אֶת־ <WH853> כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> the weapons הַמִּלְחָמָה֮ <WH4421> of war אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּיֶדְכֶם֒ <WH3027> that [are] in your hands אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אַתֶּ֜ם <WH859> you נִלְחָמִ֣ים <WH3898> wherewith ye fight בָּ֗ם אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> against the king בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> of Babylon וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> and [against] the Chaldeans הַצָּרִ֣ים <WH6696> which besiege עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> and מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> you without לַֽחוֹמָ֑ה <WH2346> the walls וְאָסַפְתִּ֣י <WH622> and I will assemble אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into תּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> them into the midst הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> of this city הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וְנִלְחַמְתִּ֤י <WH3898> And I myself will fight אֲנִי֙ <WH589> Myself אִתְּכֶ֔ם <WH854> against בְּיָ֥ד <WH3027> hand נְטוּיָ֖ה <WH5186> against you with an outstretched וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> arm חֲזָקָ֑ה <WH2389> and with a strong וּבְאַ֥ף <WH639> even in anger וּבְחֵמָ֖ה <WH2534> and in fury וּבְקֶ֥צֶף <WH7110> wrath גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> and in great

וְהִכֵּיתִ֗י <WH5221> And I will smite אֶת־ <WH853> יֽוֹשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> the inhabitants הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> of this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> both man וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and beast בְּדֶ֥בֶר <WH1698> pestilence גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> of a great יָמֻֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> they shall die

וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And afterward כֵ֣ן <WH3651> after that נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> I will deliver אֶת־ <WH853> צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֣יו ׀ <WH5650> and his servants וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֡ם <WH5971> and the people וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנִּשְׁאָרִים֩ <WH7604> and such as are left בָּעִ֨יר <WH5892> in this city הַזֹּ֜את <WH2063> likewise מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדֶּ֣בֶר ׀ <WH1698> from the pestilence מִן־ <WH4480> at הַחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> from the sword וּמִן־ <WH4480> at הָרָעָ֗ב <WH7458> and from the famine בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> into the hand נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> of Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וּבְיַד֙ <WH3027> and into the hand אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH341> of their enemies וּבְיַ֖ד <WH3027> and into the hand מְבַקְשֵׁ֣י <WH1245> of those that seek נַפְשָׁ֑ם <WH5315> their life וְהִכָּ֣ם <WH5221> and he shall smite לְפִי־ <WH6310> them with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> of the sword לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יָח֣וּס <WH2347> he shall not spare עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יַחְמֹ֖ל <WH2550> them neither have pity וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יְרַחֵֽם׃ <WH7355> nor have mercy

וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> And unto this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> to this תֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> thou shalt say כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold נֹתֵן֙ <WH5414> Behold I set לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> before אֶת־ <WH853> דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> you the way הַחַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> of life וְאֶת־ <WH853> דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> and the way הַמָּֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death

הַיֹּשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> He that abideth בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise יָמ֕וּת <WH4191> shall die בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword וּבָרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> and by the famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> and by the pestilence וְהַיּוֹצֵא֩ <WH3318> but he that goeth out וְנָפַ֨ל <WH5307> and falleth עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַכַּשְׂדִּ֜ים <WH3778> to the Chaldeans הַצָּרִ֤ים <WH6696> that besiege עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> and [יִחְיֶה כ] (וְחָיָ֔ה <WH2421> keep leave ק) וְהָֽיְתָה־ <WH1961> will have לּ֥וֹ נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> and his life לְשָׁלָֽל׃ <WH7998> shall be unto him for a prey

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שַׂ֣מְתִּי <WH7760> For I have set פָ֠נַי <WH6440> my face בָּעִ֨יר <WH5892> against this city הַזֹּ֧את <WH2063> for לְרָעָ֛ה <WH7451> for evil וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> for לְטוֹבָ֖ה <WH2896> and not for good נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> of Babylon תִּנָּתֵ֔ן <WH5414> it shall be given וּשְׂרָפָ֖הּ <WH8313> and he shall burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> it with fire ס
וּלְבֵית֙ <WH1004> And touching the house מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> [say] Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> ye the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> O house דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> of David כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD דִּ֤ינוּ <WH1777> Execute לַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> in the morning מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> judgment וְהַצִּ֥ילוּ <WH5337> and deliver גָז֖וּל <WH1497> [him that is] spoiled מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> out of the hand עוֹשֵׁ֑ק <WH6231> of the oppressor פֶּן־ <WH6435> may not תֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> go out כָאֵ֜שׁ <WH784> like fire חֲמָתִ֗י <WH2534> lest my fury וּבָעֲרָה֙ <WH1197> and burn וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> none מְכַבֶּ֔ה <WH3518> that none can quench מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> [it] because רֹ֥עַ <WH7455> of the evil [מַעַלְלֵיהֶם כ] (מַעַלְלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4611> doing ק)

הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold אֵלַ֜יִךְ <WH413> I am against יֹשֶׁ֧בֶת <WH3427> Behold I [am] against thee O inhabitant הָעֵ֛מֶק <WH6010> of the valley צ֥וּר <WH6697> [and] rock הַמִּישֹׁ֖ר <WH4334> of the plain נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <WH559> which say מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יֵחַ֣ת <WH5181> Who shall come down עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> against וּמִ֥י <WH4310> who יָב֖וֹא <WH935> against us? or who shall enter בִּמְעוֹנוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH4585> den

וּפָקַדְתִּ֧י <WH6485> But I will punish עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5921> according כִּפְרִ֥י <WH6529> you according to the fruit מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4611> of your doings נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְהִצַּ֤תִּי <WH3341> and I will kindle אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> a fire בְּיַעְרָ֔הּ <WH3293> in the forest וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> thereof and it shall devour כָּל־ <WH3605> all סְבִיבֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5439> all things round about ס
